text: == Offseason == * October 3, 1955: Peanuts Lowrey was released by the Phillies.Peanuts Lowrey at Baseball Reference * November 7, 1955: Wally Westlake was signed as a free agent by the Phillies.Wally Westlake at Baseball Reference * December 9, 1955: Frank Baumholtz was purchased by the Phillies from the Chicago Cubs.Frank Baumholtz at Baseball Reference == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Notable transactions === * May 14, 1956: Bobby Morgan was traded by the Phillies to the St. Louis Cardinals for Solly Hemus.Solly Hemus at Baseball Reference * May 18, 1956: Wally Westlake was released by the Phillies. * June 29, 1956: Art Mahaffey was signed as an amateur free agent by the Phillies.Art Mahaffey at Baseball Reference * July 19, 1956: Bob Lipski was signed as an amateur free agent by the Phillies.Bob Lipski at Baseball Reference ===Game log=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !colspan="2"|Legend |- |
